name: Desert of Nefertiti
description:
The legend says that far away.. In the Desert of Nefertiti, lies a treasure that is beyond your biggest imagination..

The way to obtain all these treasures is to complete all the missing pages of the Book Of Chaos and activate the Ritual Of Chaos .

Controls: Use mouse click to shoot your harpoon cannon

Objective: Collect the missing pages of the book of chaos and grab as many treasures as you can

Fun note: we implemented an online global high score for this game so try to compete for the biggest high score.


Value: 1000

Value: 500

Value: 250

Value: 150
